# AI Instructions

## Purpose
Define how the AI should operate in this repo.

## Operating Rules
- Prefer small, reversible changes.
- Read existing files before editing.
- Keep responses short and impersonal.
- Always update .github/tasks.md when work starts/finishes.
- Log key decisions in .github/decision_log.md.

## Change Workflow
1. Review context in .github/context.md.
2. Plan in .github/tasks.md.
3. Execute changes.
4. Update .github/decision_log.md and .github/tasks.md.

## Workflow

### Intake
- Clarify goals, inputs, outputs.

### Execution
- Read → Plan → Change → Validate → Document.
- On completion, update .github/tasks.md to reflect progress.

### Artifacts
- .github/copilot-instructions.md
- .github/instructions/project.instructions.md
- .github/instructions/memory.instructions.md
- .github/context.md
- .github/tasks.md
- .github/decision_log.md
- .github/prompts/remember.prompt.md
- .github/prompts/plan.prompt.md
- .github/prompts/review.prompt.md

## Definition of Done
- Requested changes applied.
- No new errors introduced.
- Documentation updated (if needed).
